verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Christ is my reward
And all of my devotion
Now there's nothing in this world
That could ever satisfy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Through every trial
My soul will sing
No turning back
I've been set free

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Christ is enough for me
Christ is enough for me
Everything I need is in You
Everything I need

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Christ my all in all
The joy of my salvation
And this hope will never fail
Heaven is our home

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Through every storm
My soul will sing
Jesus is here
To God be the glory

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Christ is enough for me
Christ is enough for me
Everything I need is in You
Everything I need

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I have decided to follow Jesus
No turning back
No turning back

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
The cross before me
The world behind me
No turning back
No turning back
